column1: Funeral service will be Tuesday afternoon at 1:30 p.m. at the McCormick Baptist Church at 10301 Priestly Lane
column3: Dr. Donald Schmidt and Rev. Terry Tacker officiating. Burial will follow in Nettleton Cemetery in Jonesboro
column4: Ark. with Thompson Funeral Home of Trumann in charge of arrangements. Pallbearers will be Kyle Beard
column8: Zach Penter and Lathrop Schmidt. Honorary pallbearers will be Robert Hodges
column10: Brent Long and Sid Dickson.  Visitation will be Monday evening from 5:00 p.m. until 7:00 p.m. at Thompson Funeral Home in Trumann
